description:
Observations to London Borough of Hackney in connection with erection of a 15 storey and basement building for 67,811m2 B1; 667m2 A3, 1,242m2, D2; and 577m2 A1 use with 120 car bays and demolition. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  476/2001/PB; 2002/P/C; 2003/P/C;                         2004/P/C; 2005/P/C; 2006/P/C; 2007/                         P/C; 2008/P/C; 2011/P/C; 2013/P/C;                         2014/P/C; 2016/P/C; 2018/P/C; 2019/                         P/C; 2020/P/A; 2021/P/B;2022/P/B;                         2023/P/C; 2024/P/B; 2030/P; 2031/P;                         2032/P; 2050/P/P1; planning report                         and supplementary information.
decision_conditions: This Council raises no objection to the proposal but suggests that car parking provision be substantially reduced given the accessibility of the site.
